item.title: 10 Things From Hulk's Marvel Movie Appearances That Aged Way Better Than Any Of Us Expected
item.description: Hulk has changed a lot over the course of his Marvel movie appearances, but through it all, there have been plenty of iconic and memorable moments.

item.title: Companion's 7 Deaths, Ranked By Brutality
item.description: Drew Hancock's sci-fi horror comedy movie Companion is smart, funny, and contains a number of particularly brutal and oftentimes shocking deaths.

item.title: David Corenswet’s Superman Flies Into Action In Gorgeous New DC Universe Concept Poster
item.description: David Corenswet's Superman takes flight in a new fan poster that pays tribute to the character's long history by recreating an iconic comic cover.
